mapper.sql: id, name, define, cond, show_times, data_type, remark, type, status, del_status, upd_user_id, upd_org_id, upd_tm, crt_user_id, crt_org_id, crt_tm
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from db_element
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into db_element (id, name, define, cond, show_times, data_type, remark, type, status, del_status, upd_user_id, upd_org_id, upd_tm, crt_user_id, crt_org_id, crt_tm) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{define,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crtUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
